overview: A Glaswegian standoff between a schoolgirl and a tampon machine.  When schoolgirl Leanne canâ€™t afford a sanitary pad she lines her underwear with toilet paper and ends up bleeding in front of her class during a presentation. Leanne overcomes this humiliation with a shocking act of rebellion - against a bully, a teacher, and against the stigma which acts as a barrier to her needs.
title: Free Period
